dublinCore.dc:title: 114 S539 IS: Medicare Access to Rehabilitation Services Act of 2015
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Cardin (for himself and Ms. Collins) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to repeal the Medicare outpatient rehabilitation therapy caps.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Medicare Access to Rehabilitation Services Act of 2015.
Section 1833 of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1395(l)) is amended by striking subsection (g).
